synopsis.text: Shi, a newly activated android girl, finds herself in a secluded hut under the guidance of her enigmatic creator. As he introduces her to the mundane aspects of life and the desolate world they inhabit, a series of profound conversations about life's constraints unfold. Hidamari no Shi, the fourth segment of the five-part anthology film Zoo, is the sole animated part, adapted from Otsuichi's first volume of novels bearing the same name. As the story progresses, the true intentions behind the man's creation of Shi come into question, adding a layer of mystery to this thought-provoking tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
